pageTitle: Deputy Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, January 7, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Calgary, Alberta

12:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Alberta, Jason Kenney.

McDougall Centre
Room Lougheed 1
455 6 Street SW                  

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting.
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:45 a.m.

1:45 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Calgary, Naheed Nenshi.

Calgary City Hall
800 Macleod Trail SE                     

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting.
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:30 p.m.
